item.description:
Friday, March 12, 2010 at 8:00-10:00pm
BC Quintet
Björn Wennås/Carmen Marsico Quintet

at ART Without Borders
at the Democracy Center
45 Mount Auburn Street
Cambridge, MA 02138
Tickets: $10, $5 (students). All ages welcome.
For advance tickets, please call 781-307-7306 or email info@artwb.org
For more info visit www.artwb.org

BC Quintet is:
Carmen Marsico - voice
Bjorn Wennas - guitar
Todd Marston - accordion
Kendall Eddy - bass
Austin McMahon - drums

We hope to see you there!
Carmen & Björn

We will be performing our favorite jazz standards, original compositions, some creative arrangements of Italian folk music tradition, ranging from the music of Flemish composer Orlando di Lasso to ancient Italian sun chants, as well as Carmen's favorite pop songs!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: The BC Quintet
